text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump At future #TrumpPressConference I'm not watching #MyPillowGuy bc its a PRESS CONFERENCE!!!Not a mini trump rally!His opinions about church is irrelevant to #COVID19 #CoronavirusPandemic I want to hear from #DrFauci I'm Not Getting Sucked into a tv/rally! #Coronavirustruth #GTFU!

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
